items.sentence: There is absolutely no way that I would go on a trip alone.
Why don\'t you just call Tom and tell him you can\'t do it?
You don\'t have to say anything if you don\'t feel like it.
Tom saved Mary\'s life by performing the Heimlich maneuver.
Tom told me that he didn\'t want to come home empty-handed.
I thought Tom might be the one responsible for the problem.
I thought that you said that you wanted to do that for Tom.
I want to be part of the solution, not part of the problem.
I\'m sorry, but I have a previous appointment for tomorrow.
I\'m the only one other than Tom who knows how to fix this.
